abstract: David Kenny has resigned as president of Akamai Technologies and is considering a run for the chief executive's post at Yahoo, according to two people with knowledge of the matter.
snippet: David Kenny has resigned as president of Akamai Technologies and is considering a run for the chief executive's post at Yahoo, according to two people with knowledge of the matter.
lead_paragraph: If Yahoo wants him, David Kenny is available.

headline.main: Akamai President Steps Down and Is Said to Want Top Job at Yahoo
